remarks: The value of an operation class abstraction.  Compare ~ ovig .  The condition ` ( x e. R /\ y e. S ) ` is been removed.  (Contributed by FL, 24-Mar-2007.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Dec-2013.)
statement:
ovigg.1 $e |- ( ( x = A /\ y = B /\ z = C ) -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
ovigg.4 $e |- E* z ph $.
ovigg.5 $e |- F = { <. <. x , y >. , z >. | ph } $.
ovigg $p |- ( ( A e. V /\ B e. W /\ C e. X ) -> ( ps -> ( A F B ) = C ) ) $.
$d A x y z $.
$d B x y z $.
$d C x y z $.
$d ps x y z $.
